US coronavirus deaths top 45,000, doubling in little over a week -- Reuters tally tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735072 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/735072/us-coronavirus-deaths-top-45-000-doubling-in-little-over-a-week-reuters-tally/story/ The United States has by far the world's largest number of confirmed coronavirus cases at over 810,000, almost four times as many as Spain, the country with the second-highest number. Globally, cases topped 2.5 million on Tuesday. Wed, 22 Apr 2020 10:22:57 +0800
Gamboa: Police general hurt in chopper crash still in coma; other official now conscious tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735071 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/735071/gamboa-police-general-hurt-in-chopper-crash-still-in-coma-other-official-now-conscious/story/ "Si [Police Major] General [Jose Maria] Ramos 'yun pa rin coma pa rin siya, nakakalungkot talaga, we are still praying he will be able to recover," PNP chief Police General Archie Francisco Gamboa said. On the other hand, Police Major General Mariel Magaway, is already conscious and undergoing therapy. Wed, 22 Apr 2020 10:09:51 +0800
